string.text: Barkeep needs you to pick up where a fellow stalker left off and complete the supply delivery.
The guy I hired to deliver my supplies managed to get himself killed on the last shipment. If you can finish the job for the poor bastard I'll give you his payment.
The cook at 100 Rads bar uses spices extracted from a particular plant to season the meat. Barkeep will pay you if you can find one.

The cook here has a special recipe for mutant boar's head that is so good you almost forget you're eating mutant boar's head. His secret ingredient is a spice he makes from a special plant that only grows near anomalies. I don't expect you to make a special trip to get one, but if you happen to be in the area and manage to find one I'll pay you for it.
Great, I'll give it to the cook to season the boar's head. About time too, that thing's been roasting back there for a while now.
A group of stalkers from 100 Rads bar are tracking a band of %s spotted in the area. Meet up with them and lead them in the attack.

There has been word around the bar that some %s have been causing trouble in the area. Some of the boys went out there to check it out. They got a lot of guts, but not much in the way of brains. Go meet up with them and make sure they don't get themselves killed.
Hey, %s came out to help us! There's no stopping us now, let's get 'em!
Good work keeping the area safe. Here, take this as a reward.
